item.description: #ope - I had nightmares last night. First time in I don't even know how long....

item.title: Christmas Day in the PNW
item.description: #pnw #backyard #ope - Rudolph chilling, listening to More Bounce to the Ounce, in the backyard after a hard night's work (with special guest appearance by plastic pink flamingo #1)....

#ope - “We feel like we’re good at giving people an experience that elevates their dignity, that makes them feel special,” he said. “If you do it carefully and you pay attention to the details, there’s an opportunity to blend people together. And when we all start hanging out together, we just start to understand each other better. That’s really what I am hoping for.”...

item.title: It's Both Parties
item.description: #mattifesto - The Republican Party and the Democratic Party both suck. There is no lesser evil. They are both evil. We keep letting them tell us the other party is the problem. The problem is that we believe that. The problem is that we should be keeping our party honest, not blaming the other parties....

#ope - It's not a very charitable feeling. There's very little 'good will towards men' in it. Santa may leave me a lump of coal. But...I am so proud of myself for cultivating a relationship with my boss where they completely ignore me in everything personal, including Christmas greetings, while still communicating with me professionally when necessary....

item.title: I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas
item.description: #earworm - I Want a Hippopotamus for Christmas by Gayla Peevey....
